name: 4dgl oled160-g2 notifier
tagline: android notifications to mOled-160-G2 via bluetooth
body:
### Android notifications to mOled-160-G2 via bluetooth. ------------- A very simple step by step guide/tutorial to create a wireless(bluetooth) 1.7 inch monitor, an android app to connect to it,and automatically send every notifications from android to monitor. #### required components 1)uOLED-160G2 Display Module ![uOLED-160G2](https://github.com/avraampiperidis/4dgl_oled160-g2_notifier/blob/master/pagepics/pic1.png?raw=true) [display module](http://www.4dsystems.com.au/product/uOLED_160_G2/)
2)uUSB-PA5-II Programming Adaptor ![uOLED-160G2](https://github.com/avraampiperidis/4dgl_oled160-g2_notifier/blob/master/pagepics/apic3.jpg?raw=true) [adapter](http://www.4dsystems.com.au/product/uUSB_PA5/)
3)Bluetooth module ![uOLED-160G2](https://github.com/avraampiperidis/4dgl_oled160-g2_notifier/blob/master/pagepics/bpic1.jpg?raw=true)![uOLED-160G2](https://github.com/avraampiperidis/4dgl_oled160-g2_notifier/blob/master/pagepics/bpic2.jpg?raw=true)
4)Programming Cable ![uOLED-160G2](https://github.com/avraampiperidis/4dgl_oled160-g2_notifier/blob/master/pagepics/pic4.jpg?raw=true)
5)USB to 4-pin cable ![uOLED-160G2](https://github.com/avraampiperidis/4dgl_oled160-g2_notifier/blob/master/pagepics/pic5.png?raw=true)
6)4-pin to 4-pin cable ![uOLED-160G2](https://github.com/avraampiperidis/4dgl_oled160-g2_notifier/blob/master/pagepics/pic5.jpg?raw=true)
7)Any USB power bank ![uOLED-160G2](https://github.com/avraampiperidis/4dgl_oled160-g2_notifier/blob/master/pagepics/pic6.png?raw=true)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
